basic.description:
{Basic First Aid}

Gives control of the first aid tent, heals up to {100 HP} to the first unit of the selected stack and cast {Stone Skin} at battle opening for {10 rounds}.

advanced.description:
{Advanced First Aid}

Gives control of the first aid tent, heals up to {225 HP} to the first unit of the selected stack and cast {Stone Skin} at battle opening for {25 rounds}.

expert.description:
{Expert First Aid}

Gives control of the first aid tent, heals up to {400 HP} to the first unit of the selected stack and cast {Stone Skin} at battle opening for {50 rounds}.
